contexts: The sun is actually white, but it appears yellow due to Earth's atmosphere.
Basketball players often use hand signals to communicate plays on the court.
Ancient Rome had public toilets, but they lacked any real sense of privacy.
A soccer match is typically 90 minutes long, split into two halves of 45 minutes.
Bees can recognize human faces using a process similar to pattern recognition in AI.
Baseball has been played professionally in the United States since the late 1800s.
